text:
A fine of Rs. 59,700 was collected from the vehicle users for various road rule violations during a surprise check conducted jointly by the Police and the Transport Department officials at Rasipuram recently.

A team led by V. Raju, Deputy Superintendent of Police, Rasipuram, conducted surprise check of vehicles at Anadalurgate - Attayampatti junction and also at Senthamangalam road junction.

The special team booked load vehicles for transporting workers, over-loading, driving and riding vehicles without licence, vehicles without proper papers etc.

A total of 80 vehicles were booked and a fine of Rs. 59,700 was collected from the erring drivers.
title: Fine collected from road rule violators
